description: A BuildingRoom is a space within a Building or BuildingPart intended for human occupancy (e.g. a place of work or recreation) and/or containment of animals or things. A BuildingRoom is bounded physically and/or virtually (e.g. by ClosureSurfaces or GenericSurfaces).

properties.name: class
properties.description: Indicates the specific type of the BuildingRoom.

properties.name: function
properties.description: Specifies the intended purposes of the BuildingRoom.

properties.name: usage
properties.description: Specifies the actual uses of the BuildingRoom.

properties.name: roomHeight
properties.description: Specifies qualified heights of the BuildingRoom.

properties.name: buildingFurniture
properties.description: Relates the furniture objects to the BuildingRoom.

properties.name: buildingInstallation
properties.description: Relates the installation objects to the BuildingRoom.

properties.name: lod4Solid
properties.description: Relates to a 3D Solid geometry that represents the BuildingRoom in Level of Detail 4. Deprecated since CityGML 3.0.

properties.name: lod4MultiSurface
properties.description: Relates to a 3D MultiSurface geometry that represents the BuildingRoom in Level of Detail 4. Deprecated since CityGML 3.0.
